sentences.en: Air will compress but the brake fluid won't.
sentences.cn: 空气会压缩，但是刹车油不会。

sentences.en: He braked sharply to avoid the dog.
sentences.cn: 他突然急刹车，想避开那条狗。

sentences.en: He heard tyres squeal as the car braked to avoid a collision.
sentences.cn: 他听到当汽车刹车为避免撞车时轮胎发出了刺耳的尖声。

sentences.en: He is repairing the brake lever of an automobile.
sentences.cn: 他正在修理汽车的刹车杆.

sentences.en: His front brake cable disengaged.
sentences.cn: 他的前轮刹车索断了。

sentences.en: I managed to put the brakes on just in time.
sentences.cn: 我最终及时刹了车。

sentences.en: I suddenly pressed the brake pedal and we were both thrown forward.
sentences.cn: 我突然用力踩紧刹车踏板,结果我俩的身体都向前冲去.

sentences.en: Illness had put a brake on his progress.
sentences.cn: 疾病使他的进展放缓。

sentences.en: Moira slammed on the brakes (=  used them suddenly and with a lot of force  ) .
sentences.cn: 莫伊拉猛踩刹车。

sentences.en: More than 3,000 cars were recalled yesterday because of a brake problem.
sentences.cn: 3,000多辆汽车因为刹车问题昨天被召回。

sentences.en: Test your brakes after driving through water.
sentences.cn: 车子涉水之后要检验一下刹车。

sentences.en: The accident was caused by worn brake shoes.
sentences.cn: 这事故是因煞车过度磨损而造成的.

sentences.en: The brake doesn't grip properly.
sentences.cn: 煞车不灵.

sentences.en: The brake is ineffective.
sentences.cn: 刹车失灵.

sentences.en: The brake pedal had just snapped off.
sentences.cn: 刹车踏板刚刚啪的一声绷断了。

sentences.en: The harder the brake pedal is pressed, the greater the car's deceleration.
sentences.cn: 刹车踩得越用力，车子减速越猛。

sentences.en: The rise in interest rates acted as a brake on expenditure.
sentences.cn: 利率的提高产生了抑制消费的作用.

sentences.en: the screech of brakes
sentences.cn: 刹车的刺耳噪音

sentences.en: This made the driver following her brake hard.
sentences.cn: 这使得跟在她后面的司机猛地刹车.

sentences.en: Turn a special key, press the brake pedal, and your car's brakes lock.
sentences.cn: 转动一把特制的钥匙，踩下刹车踏板，这样你的汽车刹车就锁住了。

sentences.en: Wade released the hand brake and pulled away from the curb.
sentences.cn: 韦德松开手刹驶离路边。
